title: Reward for filling in the feedback survey
body: So I just filled in the feedback survey from Riot and I thought there would propably be alot more people doing this if there was a reward waiting for them. For example a mistery gift or an icon/skin/wardskin whatever. Any opinions?

replies.body:
1. You are in the German Forum :)
2. Due to the fact that you can do this feedback survey more than once it would not be that effective for Riot.
Achso ok :D Ja aber das könnte Riot ja regeln, dass man es nur einmal pro Account ausfüllen kann.
